title: X-Men/Spider-Man (Trade Paperback)
description:
Christos Gage (Thunderbolts, House of M: Avengers) is joined by international superstar-artist Mario Alberti (Redhand) to bring you the most misunderstood team of all time meeting the most misunderstood super hero of all time in this tale of mystery that starts in the early days of the Marvel Age and winds its way through to today! See an enduring friendship develop between the web-slinger and the uncanniest mutants on Earth as they contend with Kraven the Hunter, the Blob, the Marauders and the ultimate threat from Sinister. How do those bonds endure when Spider-Man turns out to be a clone and Wolverine must fight without his Adamantium skeleton? PLUS: revisit the first time Spider-Man fought side-by-side with Xavier’s team in X-MEN #35! Collecting X-MEN/SPIDER-MAN #1-4 and X-MEN #35.
Rated T  …$14.99
ISBN: 978-0-7851-2459-7
